item.description:
Boston Beijing Opera Association Annual Performance 2010

Cambridge Family YMCA Theater
at Central Sq. T Stop.
ticket Price $10
$6 seniors & students.
for information call 781-910-5971 or email: bostonbeijingopera@gmail.com

I might try to get a group to go together and will purchase tickets from person at my work. I will email an update on that, cause at this time not even sure I will be going yet. Otherwise go ahead and purchase your own tickets.

Adele

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group
